name: Minim's Lyrical Journey
description:
The games core mechanics, includes a 3rd-person view, moving your character in  a 3D environment, walking, running, and jumping. The game has a small inventory system, to show what the player has collected.

 STORY:

Immersed in an emotional story, on a mission to re-unite with your long lost sisters... and set the music free. Hand made design with puzzles to complete and musical notes to find.

CONTROLS: 

WASD - MOVE 

SPACE - JUMP 

LEFT SHIFT - SPRINT 

I - INVENTORY 

MOUSE - LOOK & NAVIGATE 

LEFT CLICK - SELECT INVENTORY SYSTEM 

E - INTERACT
